title: Web Scraper Project Management and Improvement
description: Manage and improve the existing webscraper project by cleaning up task list, reviewing code, and implementing necessary enhancements.

title: Task List Cleanup and Reorganization
description: Review the existing task list in the 'webscraper' project and clean up duplicate tasks. Reorganize tasks to reflect the current state of the project and remove completed tasks that are still marked as pending.

title: Code Review: Scraper Implementations
description: Review the existing scraper implementations (BS4Scraper, PlaywrightScraper, SeleniumScraper) to ensure they follow best practices, handle errors properly, and extract content effectively. Identify areas for improvement.

title: Code Review: Scraper Factory and Selection Logic
description: Review the ScraperFactory implementation to ensure it effectively selects the appropriate scraper based on website complexity. Evaluate the patterns and heuristics used for selection and identify potential improvements.
